metadata.name: Lost Cosmonaut
metadata.description:
"A cosmonaut is lost in space and has given up hope of survival. As he drifts alone through the universe, he reminices about his last sight of his beloved planet earth through his space helmet's visor. Suddenly a beautiful butterfly lands on the helmet and checks out the unusual object. If this was earth, could it be that hope and life exist elsewhere."

ThisNFT was created to tell the story of a cosmonaut lost in space and time. Inspiration for this short was the iconic anime Akira by Katsuhiro Otomo.
